description: Hiro`s sister, who is a maid employed by Hime. Her cooking is recognised by Hime as the best. She is seemingly oblivious to the supernatural aspects of Hime, nor does she seem to understand Hiro`s explanation of his immortality. She lives the normal life with all the supernatural happening around her, and is completely oblivious to it. Sawawa is also known for having unusually large
name: Hiyorimi Sawawa
